website_summaries.verdict: A stable but fun towable for multiple riders, particularly kids.
pros: Durable, lasting multiple seasons when cared for
Easy to ride, with sturdy handgrips
Doesn’t flip easily at slower speeds
cons: Tube seams may split after several uses, and tube can develop leaks
Less stable when towed at high speeds

customer_reviews.title: The most fun you’ll have at 75 mph
customer_reviews.text: Where else can brothers joke about riding a giant wiener?? This thing held up to a 75 Mph supercharged jet ski and let me tell you the faces of my brothers was priceless. Then we threw about 6 kids on this thing and changed their lives to where they will require thrill seeking at level 10 for the rest of their lives. I’ve never seen such a glorious sight at 75 mph. This thing just takes a lickin and keeps on... uh... wienering!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: 30-Day Return Policy for defective items???
customer_reviews.text: Took this to the lake and didn't even last a full weekend before one of the compartments started leaking. The bun on the right side of the unit won't hold air for even five minutes and only got to use it for a couple of hours. I don't make it to the lake that often so the 30-day return window closed on me before I ever got to use it. At this point I'll try going back to the manufacturer for a replacement, but overall this was not a good experience for me and I doubt I'll be buying anymore lake toys from Amazon. A 90-day return policy for something like this would be far more reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: bettyjenn

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. We pull it using our Jetski (3 seater) ...
customer_reviews.text: I only post for products that deserve it. This thing is amazing. We pull it using our Jetski (3 seater) and the kids just LLLLOOOVVEE IT. When it's not towed they just sit on it and "sail" away. Great, durable product, holds 3 kids or two full-size adults comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Liad B.

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and the main air chamber will not stay inflated. Can’t return as it’s outside of the return window. Very disappointed in this product. Purchased early for summer use, should have tested it! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Fun !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Some gave bad reviews. I was worried. Mine is very sturdy. I am not a small person. I am over 50. I was worried I wouldn’t be able to get on it. What I did was buy a 2 person with the intention I would ride alone. And it WORKED !! I jumped off the boat and kinda did a belly flop on it while grabbing the handle. I then pulled myself up to a kneeling position. I rode like rodeo star. Again I am not athletic at all. I I can do it you can to. I’m very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Tons of fun money well spent. If you over inflate it it will be very unstable I learned this the hard way.. So I let some air out of it and it worked great. It will handle three Riders or you can also ride it on your stomach like you would tube Style inflatables. It's big enough so a 6-foot person can lay forward across it even though it's not made to be used that way it work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Frank B.

customer_reviews.title: Cover failed on second use of the product
customer_reviews.text: Initial use of the project was great. However, on the second use, the cover failed at the seam. A warranty claim to Airhead has been submitted. Depending on the resolution, I will revise my review.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Leavitt

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with the main plug so i was not able to use it for our trip. It seems this has been an ongoing issue as multiple customers have tje same problem...would not recommend to buy
customer_reviews.author: Kwhite

customer_reviews.title: A fun toy for the family!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and her family. it has been a big hit this summer. The 3 person version was a good choice. Fits the two kids plus one adult very easily. It's still pretty big, It's also stable, for getting on and off it, and does not tip easily so little kids can ride it safely and without fear. Quality of the materials, and the fit and finish, are both very good. We dont' hesitate to recommend this tube. My overall experience with Airhead is that they make a quality product. This one didn't disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Deveau

customer_reviews.title: Subpar valves
customer_reviews.text: The center chamber has an updated inflation valve that works great. The side chambers have the 100-year-old valve that is nearly impossible to inflate fully and seal without losing air. After several attempts while out on the boat, we gave up and will be returning this. With the colder water and hot sun in my area, the tube needs to be adjusted way too much to deal with these valves.
customer_reviews.author: Done

customer_reviews.title: 2 "small" riders only!
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be longer since it said it's for two; two "small" people (kids) can fit on it but not two regular or bigger sized adults! Wished I would have gotten the one for three but don't want the hassle of returning it so will just keep it and take one person tubing at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Kuhn Jr.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY... TEARS UP AND POOR WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in May 2018. Used 4 months. Had a 1 year warranty and first time it was used in May 2019, the handles broke and it was completely faded out (stored in a shed out of sun). Contacted the company and they said the one year warranty was up even though it wasn't used for 8 months. Paid $154.00. DO NOT BUY THIS!!! I WOULDN'T EVEN GIVE THIS ONE STAR!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best ride on the lake
customer_reviews.text: We are a boating family that is now on our fourth or fifth hot dog! If you do not want all the kids on your boat, do not buy this. This is our most popular boat toy and the kids never want to get off. We always get waves and lookyloos all over the lake as we tow this toy. It is very sturdy, especially the three seater.
customer_reviews.author: Meggie Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for countless water fun
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item for our boat trips on the lake...and it has become the greatest entertainment for our entire family. We have 4 kids (ages 8,7,6 and 5) and they all enjoy riding on the banana boat along with an adult. The material is very sturdy and much better than expected. The vents allow for easy access to blow up and release air afterwards. I am very pleasantly surprised with the product and would highly recommend it. We have also used it with 5 adults and have no complains about it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Milagros Castro

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, Great quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Used at Lake of the Ozarks for an entire week. Good construction and material, held up nicely for lots of kids/adults. TONS of fun. Just be careful not to take turns to hard, and watch for waves so that adults don't knock heads if it buckels on the dip of a wave! Kids are so small and lightweight this is not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Logdigital

customer_reviews.title: Great Tube Alternative
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent towable for the lake in the summer. It's fun to ride and feels different than a tube. It holds three people! The build quality is nice and should last many boating seasons, if properly taken care of and stored indoors while not in use. It looks like a hotdog on the water. Be sure to buy the tow line for it too! It's not the same thing as a ski line by the way =)
customer_reviews.author: IrixGuy's Adventure Channel

customer_reviews.title: Hole
customer_reviews.text: Got it and took it out of the box to save room— and..... threw box away. Brought it to our vacation home with us and blew it up. It wasn’t blowing up very fast so we looked closely and there was a big hole in it right at the seam. I am guessing I can’t return because I don’t have box. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is not bad. The inner tube move around a bit in ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is not bad. The inner tube move around a bit in the material and you have to try fish around to find the valve. I is also a bit smaller than I would have like. I would say that it is for one small adult or 2 kids
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Yeehaw!
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome pull tube. Rides three comfortably. Takes some of the sheer terror out of inflatable tubing. Grandkids from 3 to 18 have had a blast riding this. You could not have got the little ones on a traditional round “inner tube” inflatable. This elongated tube is east to hang on to and is far more stable than traditional tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Imel

customer_reviews.title: Great tube! Everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hotdog tub. Its not huge and easy to carry and inflate. It hold both my teenage kids and nieces and nephews and it also works great for my younger kids. I get asked all the time where I got it from and it’s a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon W

customer_reviews.title: Towable Jet-Ski
customer_reviews.text: Large, durable and accommodating. I only tried pulling one person at a time with a 19 foot 150 hp in the bay and she enjoyed it very much. But three of us fit on it while just playing. It's easier to climb onto from the water with someone holding the opposite end. I took all the advice about inflating it with cooled air so that I wouldn't experience the illusion of deflation when it hit the cold water. It held its firmness for the few hours we spent out. I only used it once, but packed it up well for next season!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse J

customer_reviews.title: Have a good spotter!
customer_reviews.text: The inner part gets twisted up and out of sync with the outer part. Pretty well made and durable. Take a long time to dry out. Legs get tired pretty quick sitting in this position. Hard to flip over, which is good for smaller kids. Fun for them to have a few on at a time. Keep an eye out for the kid at the back when they fall off and no one notices!
customer_reviews.author: TVZ

customer_reviews.title: New favorite lake toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4-year old and 6-year old grandsons. They laugh through the entire ride...it's been a huge hit!! It is very well made and sturdy enough for my son to ride with his boys...and he's a BIG boy!! We have had a lot of fun on this lake toy and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn J.

customer_reviews.title: Family loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for all ages. My kids liked this more than our big bertha tube. It's probably more suitable for kids than adults but it still works. If more heavier people are on you need a strong boat to get the tube out of the water. The only issue I had was a bubble that formed the first time we used it due to over-inflation. So be careful not to do that. The inside bladder might not be that strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jay D.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the Hassel spend extra money on a better product
customer_reviews.text: The chambers blew apart leaked air after 2nd use I don't even want to contact them after reading reviews. This is junk can't even get your money back because warranty expired. I purchased it in winter when on sale used in summer once and chambers blew as part before I got n it to the lake.
customer_reviews.author: abel v rodrigue

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: What a fun little play toy for the lake. Perfect for a diverse group of riders. Seems sturdy enough! My kids love it, therefore I love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen W.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to pull my son, niece and nephew (ages 12 and 13). They absolutely LOVED it! My nephew hated getting off and begged to go again! The 3 rode it with no problems. We also rode with just 2. It was easy to inflate and deflate. Can't wait to use it again!
customer_reviews.author: sungifts

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product and love the fun I am having on ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product and love the fun I am having on it. The space is not for adults but 3 can be comfortable on it. Two points to improve...from the first time you spend like an hour on it,you have to refill the air(let me compare it to an air mattress,that you have to refill )and maybe having a firmer way to hold during the ride. Dont take me wrong...it is good quality and I am happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: LILLIE CRITCHFIELD

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: The kids have had a blast with this. It is easy to inflate and deflate. Easy to hang on too. We had our grandkids on it and they are ages 7-14.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended :)
customer_reviews.text: Glad i purchased the three seater rather than the 2 seater. It would be hard for three adults to fit on it. But if you have three children they could ride on it comfortably. I would recommend the three seater over the two seater. Great product, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rayle

customer_reviews.title: Very Stable Tube
customer_reviews.text: Used this last summer for young teens. They loved it. Only complaint is it is a bit too stable. Had to work very hard to buck the kids off this thing. Wish I would have bought this for them when they were younger. Pulls three 13 year old girls without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B Kanaar

customer_reviews.title: Great product quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: Family has used for two summers and everything is still intact. Kids and grandkids love the ride. Not easy to bounce the grandkids off with the secure handles. We hear lots of squeals.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stuck

customer_reviews.title: Terribly made. Does not hold up in the water ...
customer_reviews.text: Terribly made. Does not hold up in the water at all. Deflates quickly. I returned it and received another and the same thing happened. Do not buy this fun looking towable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product -some of the finest fun in the water
customer_reviews.text: Great product as advertised and has held up with all the rough treatment . Definitely something any family pool should have.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.B

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the summer!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this Hot Dog. We bought a tow behind that holds two people where you sit side by side and the kids did not like it. It was too rough and hurt their back and neck. This Hot Dog was perfect for them. If you are only looking for one for 2 people get the 3 person Hot Dog. It is bigger and provides more room for the kids to sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Nitro007

customer_reviews.title: After using this one day, with a max of ...
customer_reviews.text: After using this one day, with a max of 2 people on it at a time, the seam came apart and it looked as though the giant weenie had an std. I am returning it for a new one and if it happens again I will return it and not replace it.
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE A MOGG

customer_reviews.title: only lasted a year.
customer_reviews.text: Went flat on one side and no way to fix it. Had to toss it, glad I didnt review it till now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is fun! It simulates more of what it would feel like on a seated jet ski since you are sitting upright instead of laying flat on your stomach. My kid's love it. KEEP in mind - they can WIPE OUT if you go to fast when turning course. If the kids are old enough and like that sort of thing. Otherwise it's a good buy. We've had it 2 going on 3 summers now.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious when purchasing a like new item!
customer_reviews.text: The air plug for the main tube was missing , this made it a very difficult part to find and make work .
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but Kind of a dud...
customer_reviews.text: Works okay but so long doesn't seem to be very easy to maneuver/glide kids around the wake while towing. Amazing how much gas my boat ate pulling thing. Friends went with the 3 person model and seems to do better than the 5 up we bought. Kind of a dud with the kids and me.
customer_reviews.author: Jake from Cbus

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for older children and adults. My younger grandchildren love riding. My two and five year olds ride it by themselves. One person can ride as well as three.
customer_reviews.author: B. Baxley

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy - Better
customer_reviews.text: The bladder on the side of this came apart after only a few uses. For this price I was hoping it would last longer. Would give it 0 stars if I could. Update, the company has replaced this item at NC, will let you know how it holds up over the next summer.
customer_reviews.author: be.a.blessing

customer_reviews.title: A great wiener ride.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with our hotdog. It came on time and in good condition. It's sturdy and well crafted. It rides smoothly and is roomy. It's fun for 1, 2, or 3 people. It was easy to inflate and deflate as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sean simmons

customer_reviews.title: Needs some quality improvement. Spot on with design.
customer_reviews.text: We love the product, but quality could be better. We bought 2 dogs and recently bought another to replace the one that was coming apart. Then the other one ripped. It's frustrating and we don't want to keep replacing so frequently. *update: the third dog is ripped 😢😭
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her friends love being pulled on this behind the boat. It fits two average size teenage girls perfect. Very durable and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for boating fun
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so much fun to take out boating. We've had so much fun with this. We would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Sisco

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built and the kids 7,9, and 11 had a great time being pulled behind the boat. One caution. Kids should sit with feet behind them (as described on the inflatable) rather than knees up or they risk getting blisters on their ankles. One improvement would be boston valves on the side wings to make it a bit easier to deflate but it wasn't a real problem.
customer_reviews.author: Glenna

customer_reviews.title: fun product-worthless warranty
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed the tube but it cracked while deflated in storage over the winter. Warranty claim placed, including required information and photos, within the one year warranty period. After several tries Airhead has ignored us completely.
customer_reviews.author: trygve erickson

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AMAZING in the water
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING in the water! I was honestly surprised by how quickly it inflated, 5 minutes TOPS! The materials are excellent and is super easy to fold and store. We've used it every weekend since we purchased it and it hasn't failed us once in any aspect. Overall, VERY pleased with this purchase. Would definitely recommend to anyone who enjoys water sports!
customer_reviews.author: Lizz Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Side “bun” tubes don’t last.
customer_reviews.text: This towable is very fun. Our kids love it. Unfortunately after about 5 uses, one of the side “bun” tubes went flat. We bought the same hot dog tube several years ago and the exact same thing happened with that one. The hole was on a seam and it was irreparable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Airhead HD-3 Hot Dog Towable
customer_reviews.text: Even the adults like this. It is mostly just to ride behind the boat. Does not want to go over the wake, but it is so safe for the children and very comfortable for everyone. They like to make it bounce up and down while riding. The children's ages are 9, 9, and 12. The adults' ages are - well, they don't want me to give out their age.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a blast...
customer_reviews.text: Me and my three out of shape 40 something brothers can't wait to have our "hold my beer" moment on this thing. It's going to be glorious. (I've purchased a few airhead towables and they are all well made)
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Bought during the winter. My kids are having a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought during the winter. My kids are having a hard time climbing on it. Tried to return it after 1 use, but was outside of the return window. Maybe next year.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: Too unstable. The kids are afraid of falling into the water.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun, fun, fun! I can't tell you how much fun we've had pulling this behind our jet ski. Our son and his friends have a great time on it. While it's still a ton of fun for older kids (and adults) it's perfect for smaller kids as it is VERY stable and difficult to flip over.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the kids, would not recommend for 2 adults.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: For the price I thought it wouldn't last very long ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price I thought it wouldn't last very long but used it the entire summer and will bring it out again next summer. Did fit teenage girls or 2 bigger teenage boys.
customer_reviews.author: busymomof3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! My boys (4) and cousin (13) had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My boys (4) and cousin (13) had a wonderful time on the new hot dog tube last weekend. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K.Will

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: Searched everywhere for this at a reasonable price and of course amazon was the way to go! We used it at the lake with family behind our boat and it was perfect. The lake sometimes gets a little rough and the think can as type material is very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea duran

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Have used it a few times and 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Have used it a few times and 1 time with 3 people for about a 20 min. pull. It is a little cumbersome for taller people since you really sit on your knees.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, just like our other AirHead tubes ;) So much fun! Must get!
customer_reviews.author: La Nena D

customer_reviews.title: A fun ride!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this! To be clear, the riders have very little control and they just sit there as the boat cruises around. Zig zagging makes it more fun as the hot dog crosses the wake. This is definitely my kids' favorite water toy and so I would highly recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the kids. Not as durable and big as our previous one which lasted for years.
customer_reviews.author: k-tchr

customer_reviews.title: Bad amazon customer service
customer_reviews.text: When received very damaged box. Talked to Amazon they said send it back in box which was totally destroyed..decided to inflate..small leak ,which we patched have now uses several times and seems to be holding up fine..my 4 year old grandchildren love..
customer_reviews.author: cherylburnett

customer_reviews.title: Was excited to use but disappointed. 3 people is too much weight
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to use but disappointed. 3 people is too much weight! Kept going underwater when towed by boat. 1adult and 2 kids was the limit.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus M.

customer_reviews.title: Go jump in the lake!
customer_reviews.text: This was reduced because box had been opened. Quality was brand new inside. What a deal! We are really enjoying it at the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug423

customer_reviews.title: To Small
customer_reviews.text: This is SMALL. No way could we fit 5 people on this, we fit 3 small children on this DOG! Should be called a Mini Wiener! ! !
customer_reviews.author: Chloe W.

customer_reviews.title: Seam broke
customer_reviews.text: One of the seams opened up between the main chamber and one of the side chambers causing the hotdog to become uneven on the first time using the float.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: It is a lot of fun and not so big it can't be tossed in ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been put through a lot of abuse and stood the test of time. It is a lot of fun and not so big it can't be tossed in the boat if needed. The only reason I didn't give it 5 is because the tubes on the sides twist and have to be straightened out sometimes
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanyanne Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for five!
customer_reviews.text: Tons of fun for the whole family! You can fit 5 people on this towable, it is easy to clean, and easy to deflate and store even on the boat. It's gets a few looks and laughs since it's a giant weiner and people always ask where we got it. Definitely a must have this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: We used this a total of about 4 hrs over ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this a total of about 4 hrs over 3 different days & now one of the buns is totally split and not fixable-this replaced a tube we've had for over 10 years--don't know if we got a lemon but I'd keep shopping around if thinking of ordering this.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great tube!
customer_reviews.text: Great tube!! I got my 2 teenagers and myself on it and it was a blast. It is well made and handled the water great. I would recommend. My children are 17, 14, 10, 8,8 and 5....they all loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Held the weight of the children and inflated well. Does not keep the inflation strong and The stitching came apart after 5 rides. Finding it hard to find a place or person to re-stitch.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: It's a Blast
customer_reviews.text: For those who don't want to lay down on a towable, this is pretty fun. Seating 3 also works well to take more people out at once. I tow this behind a WaveRunner and it works great. Technically, I shouldn't tow that many people but we use it in a coastal sound area where the water's about 4' deep, so you can always walk back to the house if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: The kids will Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We Love it! The quality is second to none. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: This is a blast! Great value
customer_reviews.text: This was the highlight of our reunion. Taller/older people will have to extend their legs or kneel sharply as it is not that tall. We had a blast with it! Heavy duty material. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Maurine Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this.
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge hit. Seems sturdy & holds air well. I had trouble with the quick valves until finding out the check flapper needs to be punched open somewhat with a blunt tool. Older adults might find the riding position tough on the knees, but it easily rode two kids ~ 9 yrs. and a full size male. A little hard to board from the water.
customer_reviews.author: Aubreii Testudo

customer_reviews.title: We love purr Weiner!
customer_reviews.text: Officially named "the wiener". The girls love to go tubing on the wiener and we love the fact we aren't spending hours taking turns on a traditional tube. Three at once makes it quicker and more fun for the riders. Easy to get back onto when your flipped, even for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Elander

customer_reviews.title: The kiddos loved it but said they liked the tube better
customer_reviews.text: The kiddos loved it but said they liked the tube better. They said you just sit on it and it doesn't throw you off. I haven't ridden it yet, but it looks like loads of fun! It's pretty big! It is very well made. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! Use it for my jetski to sit ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Use it for my jetski to sit in the middle and do tricks over the wake. I also take my daugher and her friends on it. Fantastic quality, really holds up to sand and a beating on the waves.
customer_reviews.author: Shereneaun

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hot dog!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun towable and has lasted the whole summer season. We look forward to it again next year!
customer_reviews.author: David J. Drummond

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: This has been a hit with children. A little too small for adults but great fun for kids!
customer_reviews.author: RiderRalph

customer_reviews.title: Angry and disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandsons for Christmas. Today was our first day boating of the season. Took it out of the box for the first time at the lake, aired it up and much to our disappointment won’t hold air. Never even got it in the water. Frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Jana Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Get something bigger
customer_reviews.text: This thing is stupid , only one little kid could ride it. Small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Summer fun
customer_reviews.text: Way too fun. Wife actually broke her rib riding this tube last summer. It is a blast to ride and is made very well. Paid twice as much for one that was half the quality as this tube.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Roark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great for younger kids since it is stable in the water
customer_reviews.author: Paula D.

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to inflate
customer_reviews.text: The middle valve is the only one with a Boston valve. The side valves are covered by thick plastic blocking air flow. I can’t even get them to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy with this purchase. It got a hole ...
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this purchase. It got a hole in it the second time we used it and we were only pulling 2 small children both times. Unfortunately, we have exceeded our time to return it, so we are just out a hundred bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: The thing ripped where it hooks to the rope while pulling out teenage son. Only the 4th time we used it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good construction and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a 45th of July party at my lake house to pull behind a jet ski. Good construction and looks good, but very small. Might fit 2 10 year old children. My adult guests couldn't ride it.
customer_reviews.author: vbdaemon

customer_reviews.title: Fun Tube
customer_reviews.text: After one day at the lake, the kds love the hot dog. Not as stable as a flat 3-person tube but still lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Badger

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren, their parents, and friends love "hot dogging" alone the river. It is constructed of durable material, was easy to inflate, and is a ton of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Super fun. 15 year old girls had a blast. Small kids loved it too. I think I am going to get the 5 seater though.
customer_reviews.author: taylor mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun - most used tube by family and friends
customer_reviews.author: mtymouse

customer_reviews.title: Busted the first time
customer_reviews.text: The inner tube popped on the first use. No patch kit either. Waste of $
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really tow that well. Even with only two ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really tow that well. Even with only two people. NO WAY this thing can hold 5 people. Too unstable. We tried.
customer_reviews.author: gregory brock

customer_reviews.title: An awesome deal and great product
customer_reviews.text: We looked at this water tube in town and couldn't find it for less than $120 +tax. Amazon gave it to us for $103 including shipping and tax. This tube pulls behind our fish and ski like a dream. It never dips down in front at take off and skims over wakes like it is hovering. Much better than a lay flat tube for our family. My daughter and her friend laughed and laughed while riding, falling and getting back on. A great, safe tube for any family with a boat to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Grant

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. First time we used one entire side deflated. Not we are outside of the return date and can’t return. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun for all.
customer_reviews.text: Was a blast to ride! Tips easily, kids and adults loved it. It didn’t arrive with the Boston valve (screw cap to hold/deflate air). Used one from my other towable and worked fine. Contacted Airhead via email and got one shipped to us.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Barbery

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and well made
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this tube - but only for a short while. They tire out after 15-20 minutes of riding because you have to use your core muscles to stay on it. It's only fun for a while and then they want to move on to a different tube. The tube is made of heavy duty materials and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dewey

product_meta.title: Airhead Hot Dog | 1-5 Rider Towable Tube for Boating
product_meta.description: Monster dog is more like it! You’ll have the time of your life on this “water weenie” designed for 1 to 5 riders. JUMBO DOG has deluxe nylon-wrapped handles. The neoprene knuckle guards and seat pads are for comfort and to help you stay on top. Rope hook-ups are super easy with the heavy-duty Kwik-Connect. Three 30-gauge vinyl air chambers are fully encased by a double stitched 1,680-denier nylon cover. JUMBO DOG is equipped with a Boston valve for the ultimate in inflating and deflating convenience. 150”x 44”(deflated)
feature_bullets: Kwik-Connect - Airhead's patented Kwik-Connect for quick and easy rope connection
Fully Covered - Heavy-duty full nylon cover
EVA Padding - Provides a more comfortable ride and helps reduce chaffing
Padded Handles - Non-slip cushioned handles providing comfort and stability
